name: SAMUDRA
description:
SAMUDRA follows the story of a boy who fell into the deepest sea and pushes forth to find a way back towards the surface world.



Discover an Ocean filled with quirky deep-sea dwellers, opportunistic exploiters, ethereal locations, a dose of social sattire & tons tons tons of polutions.



Experience an interactive & puzzle filled game-play revolving the elements of Light & Darkness, Sea Pollution, Nature VS Corporate, there are easter eggs to be hunted and secrets to be uncovered.



SAMUDRA is an atmospheric visual experience with no dialogues/ text, with simple control and icons serving as the only guiding hands throughout this dreamlike trip. This game can be experienced by anyone regardless of their age & spoken language.



CALL TO SUPPORT:
SAMUDRA will be released in 2020 and we’ll be updating our progress regularly till then. All support/ feedbacks/ donation/ collaborations are absolutely welcomed & will be most appreciated! Feel free to leave a comment on your experience of the demo so far! THANK YOU!
